00025 #ifndef __HardwareIndexBuffer__
00026 #define __HardwareIndexBuffer__
00027 
00028 // Precompiler options
00029 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00030 #include "OgreHardwareBuffer.h"
00031 #include "OgreSharedPtr.h"
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034 
00036     class _OgreExport HardwareIndexBuffer : public HardwareBuffer
00037     {
00038         public:
00039             enum IndexType {
00040                 IT_16BIT,
00041                 IT_32BIT
00042             };
00043 
00044         protected:
00045             IndexType mIndexType;
00046             size_t mNumIndexes;
00047             size_t mIndexSize;
00048 
00049         public:
00051             HardwareIndexBuffer(IndexType idxType, size_t numIndexes, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage,
00052                 bool useSystemMemory, bool useShadowBuffer);
00053             ~HardwareIndexBuffer();
00055             IndexType getType(void) const { return mIndexType; }
00057             size_t getNumIndexes(void) const { return mNumIndexes; }
00059             size_t getIndexSize(void) const { return mIndexSize; }
00060 
00061             // NB subclasses should override lock, unlock, readData, writeData
00062     };
00063 
00064 
00066     class _OgreExport HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr : public SharedPtr<HardwareIndexBuffer>
00067     {
00068     public:
00069         HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr() : SharedPtr<HardwareIndexBuffer>() {}
00070         explicit HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr(HardwareIndexBuffer* buf);
00071     };
00072 }
00073 #endif
